Package com.qdc.lims.ui.controller

package com.qdc.lims.ui.controller
JavaFX controllers for the main desktop UI flows.

Controllers bind FXML views to services and repositories, handling user interactions, validation, and view-model mapping.

    Small JavaFX UI utilities and helper functions.
